name: Overtime Catastrophe
description:
You are an office employee, left alone to work overtime. But suddenly the office printer comes alive, and prints sheets of paper with instructions that would ruin your life if you were to follow them. Can you get out of this situation with your life intact, or will you (somehow) suffer a horrible death to an office printer?

[This is a prototype that explores the concept of a horror game about something that isn't inherently scary. In this case, an office with a possessed printer. Feel free to provide feedback using the QR code in the main menu!]
